question: The Patriotic poem "Sarfaroshi ki tamanna ab hamare dil mein hai" was written by who of the following?
explanation: In the year 1921, Bismil Azimabadi of Patna wrote the Patriotic poem \"Sarfaroshi ki tamanna ab hamare dil mein hai\". But the slogan was first used by Ramprasad Bismil (Co-founder of Hindustan Republic Association).
